nio/PostSignal.description: Opens up a url endpoint to which you can POST json objects. These will then be output as signals.

endpoint.title: Endpoint
endpoint.description: Endpoint at which to accept signals.

include_headers.title: Include Headers
include_headers.description: Whether to include headers on post response

port.title: Port
port.description: Port to accept signals on. Defaults to 8182.

default.description: A new signal for each successful POST to this block.

post.description: Notifies a signal from the block immediately, configured with a dictionary parameter.
